src:
Polícia encontra 41 imigrantes em caminhão frigorífico na Grécia

04 Nov 2019, 11:49

Salónica, Grécia, 4 Nov 2019 (AFP) - A polícia descobriu 41 migrantes, a maioria jovens de nacionalidade afegã, escondidos em um caminhão refrigerado circulando no norte da Grécia, informaram fontes policiais gregas.
Sete dos migrantes apresentaram problemas respiratórios, e foram hospitalizados.
str-mr/chv/zm/cn
text:
Police find 41 immigrants in refrigerated truck in Greece

04 Nov 2019, 11:49

Thessaloniki, Greece, 4 Nov 2019 (AFP) - Police discovered 41 migrants, mostly young Afghans, hiding in a refrigerated truck circulating in northern Greece, Greek police sources said.
Seven of the migrants had respiratory problems and were hospitalized.
